channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple iPhone Fold Design To Beat Folding Phones’ Critical Flaw, New Leak Says
item.description: Apple is said to be working on a folding iPhone. Now, an indepth report from an industry heavyweight gives details on what it could be like.

item.title: The opposite of a good idea…
item.description: might also be a good idea. The hard part isn’t finding proof before you begin. The hard part is beginning, knowing you might not succeed.

item.title: Steam Deck Users Get A Special ‘Final Fantasy VII Rebirth’ Update

item.title: 3 Reasons Why You Might Be ‘Shelaborating’—By A Psychologist
item.description: Ever feel like you explain yourself too much? Here are three reasons why you may feel compelled to “shelaborate.”
